product.title: Crep Protect Biodegradable Sneaker Cleaning Wipes - Individually Wrapped Shoe Cleaning Wipes for Leather, Suede, Nubuck, Canvas, Nylon, Vinyl (Pack of 12)

reviews.title: Game-Changer for Sneaker Care On-The-Go
reviews.body: As someone who values the appearance of their footwear, finding a solution that offers both convenience and effectiveness was a game-changer. These wipes have become my go-to for maintaining my sneaker collection, and here's why.  Firstly, the versatility of these wipes is impressive. They're designed to tackle various stains and dirt, ensuring my sneakers always look fresh. I've used them on different materials, from leather to suede, and the results are consistently satisfying. The dual-textured design is ingenious – one side for tough stains and the other for general cleaning. This thoughtful feature means I can address different levels of dirt with the same wipe.  The convenience factor is another major plus. The wipes are individually wrapped, which makes them perfect for on-the-go scenarios. I've stashed them in my car, backpack, and even my office drawer. Whether I'm traveling or just out for a day, having the ability to quickly clean up any unexpected scuffs or stains is invaluable.  Their effectiveness is not just a claim; it's a reality. I've been pleasantly surprised by how well these wipes remove dirt and stains without damaging the shoe material. They're gentle yet powerful, and I've seen them work wonders on some of my most stubborn marks.  Moreover, the Crep Protect brand has established itself as a leader in sneaker care, and these wipes are a testament to their innovation and understanding of what sneaker enthusiasts need. Their commitment to quality is evident in every wipe.  These wipes have become an essential part of my sneaker care routine. They're convenient, effective, and versatile – a trifecta that's hard to beat. For anyone who cherishes their sneaker collection, these wipes are a must-have. They keep your shoes looking spotless with minimal effort, ensuring you're always stepping out in style.

reviews.title: Average Shoe Wipes
reviews.body: Shoes wipes that are very sturdy (meaning they will not tear or shred even if used aggressively) and well soaked to use over 1 to 3 pairs of shoes. The small dimensions of the wipe are deceiving because I have averaged 3 shoes per wipe and never felt like I had to limit my use on any one pair in order to cover all 3 pairs; there is plenty of cleanser on the wipe to do a good cleaning of all 3 pairs. The overall results are good. I would say 3.5/4 out of 5. It won’t remove every stain or dirt spot, so don’t expect a perfect result.12 wipes come packed in a thin sturdy aluminum case. Recommend for any leather shoe. I would rebuy when I need more in the future.

reviews.title: Really Works
reviews.body: I purchased these wipes, to use along with the "Crep Protect: The Ultimate Rain & Stain Resistant Barrier" spray. I must admit that I was skeptical, at first. I used the spray on my Nike Air Max 270's, and they still look nearly brand new. I initially treated them with the spray, and then wiped them from time to time (when necessary) with the wipes. I've worn my sneaks in red sand, mud, and dirt; and practically every day on vacation in Mexico (various cities) and Turkey. This product was suggested to me, by the rep who sold me my sneakers, in Finish Line. He said that he uses it on his sneakers, and prefers it over competitor brands. That originally sold me. I would definitely recommend this product, and will be purchasing again, when I run out. I've had my sneaks for a little over a year now, while maintaining with this product.

Not sure the extra price point for the brand name was worth it.

reviews.title: Pretty disappointing
reviews.body: I’m usually a “you get what u pay for” kinda guy. These though, are not worth the money. I had high hopes but they’re really ineffective. Baby wipes actually work better because they have more of a slight lathering effect. These are pretty much like only water is in them. They don’t remove marks or dirt that’s set in the shoe. Only dust. The rough side is no more effective than the smooth side on the mid soles. The packaging is nice and the portability is okay, but I’d rather just use a napkin and water if I’m out and about and need a quick wipe. I’ve tried to use them just to wipe down a pair before heading out the door, and they’re not even good for that. Would definitely not buy again.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023

reviews.title: Really works, 2-3 pairs of shoes
reviews.body: Bought this to use on the white boost portion of my Adidas NMD's. I'm comparing 2 pairs of the same sneaker in my pictures - one pair I used this product on them and the other I didn't. It's pretty clear that this stuff works, and I've worn the sneakers out in the rain and you can actually see the water bead up on them. It's really easy to apply, and the smell dissipates within the same day of spraying them.  Only complaint I have is for $15 you're only going to protect 2 pairs of shoes, maybe 3 if you stretch it. I now use this on all my new sneaks that I want to protect.
reviews.body_html:

reviews.title: SUPER EASY FIX FOR CLEANING YOUR KICKS
reviews.body: At first look the kit is visually appealing. The 3-piece set comes in a zippered case which felt like quality material.  The brush and towel are branded with the Crep Logo and are nicely paired which the design and scheme.  Now on to the product. The cleaner is a fairly good sized bottle and suggests uses a good amount with the brush. It lathers up nicely with warm water and quickly removed dirt and graying on one of my shoes. It has a pleasant smell that doesn’t resemble a cleaning product. After lathering with the brush I wiped it off and the shoe was much cleaner that before. It took a couple of applications but eventually got it all clean.  After drying the shoe it looked even better. I like this product for the value and overall effectiveness. I plan on buying the whole kit now. Worked on suede shoes also. Highly Recommended!

reviews.title: Probably the BEST shoe cleaner
reviews.body: This is simply amazing stuff. It comes with just as you see, a nice solid brush, which is soft and thick with a comfortable to hold wooden handle, the cleaning solution in a plastic bottle, the white microfiber cloth and the case. The case is sturdy and quite nice with a heavy duty zipper on it. The cloth is not cheap either. It is thick soft microfiber with embroidery on it and around the edges. Very good quality materials that have held up a while now. It is very simple to use and isn't very messy at all. A bowl of warm water and what you have in the kit is all you need. The bottle of solution should last quite a while. It says in the instructions to apply it liberally to the brush, but I haven't needed to use much in my case. I don't know how well it would clean a pair of VERY dirty shoes. For me, I used the kit for all of my bright white canvas Van's, white canvas Adidas and shoes like that. Bright white ones. I clean them as they get dirty, meaning if they get stained or dirty, I don't leave them for weeks and weeks and try to clean them after the fact. Any time I have gotten something on them, I break out this cleaning kit and it has always performed well. People can't believe how clean and white my shoes look all the time. You can't go wrong getting this. I have tried many many different kits over the years and this one is the best I have found to date.

reviews.title: Good kit!  No miracles here.
reviews.body: I think my "after" probably looks more like the average "before" haha. These Orions were a cheap eBay deal that arrived needing much attention, but salvageable. I can now wear them so that they look more like shoes I've owned myself for years, a little less like shoes that were dragged out of the dumpster. I found this kit pleasant, simple, and easy to use. The brush is a bit too soft, but that probably keeps you from getting carried away and damaging your shoes - and it is good quality. The case and cloth are also good quality, and the soap legitimately foams up with very little. I would say it is 100% whatever they use at the car wash. It smells exactly like the car wash, no joke - but not overpowering or offensive. I would recommend this kit, just be realistic about managing expectations. Your shoes will look a lot better, but there is some wear (i.e. years of rubber discoloration on vintage sneakers) that will just never really come off. But still worth it! Recommend for sure -

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023

reviews.title: Happy with the results i got
reviews.body: After using this item for a little over a month, I am happy to report that it works great. the item looks the same as the pictures and it successfully removes stains from my white Yeezys. I have tested this shoe cleaning kit with yeezys, vans, and converse. Crep protect easily removed the dirt stains from the upper from all my shoes. The midsoles from Yeezys and vans were left very clean and it removed most of the dirt on my vans making the sole white again. This product will not remove Oxidation from your Yeezy sole, just the dirt. The only downside I encountered while using this product was the difficulty of cleaning the midsole of my converse. I wasn't able to achieve the same results as my vans and yeezys on the midsoles. The kit is small enough to fit in a backpack but not your pocket. I would be buying this again because of its performance and size.

reviews.title: Excellent package of products that really give your shoes a apring clean.
reviews.body: This is a very handy cleaning kit that has all you need to give your shoes a spring clean. The kit comes in a great travel case and the packaging is very well presented. The brush is a good size and bristle strength, as some have said in previous reviews, the brush may be a little harsh for softer more delicate fabrics but for my applications it was perfect. The solution goes a long way and foams up really well.  It isn't bleach so it isn't going to miraculously make your shoes instantly new, but with some patience and work you can give them a really good refresh.  I looked at all the usual suspects but chose this product due to the strong reviews, packaging and price. I can safely say I am very pleased with my purchase. I attached some pictures of my Nile Air Zoom Pegasus before and after as a way to compare. Did a great job.

reviews.title: Cleans your shoes without cleaning out your wallet.
reviews.body: The media could not be loaded. This stuff actually works! I've tried other high-priced shoe cleaners before and Crep Protect is just as effective, if not better, than all of them. The package comes with everything you need to start cleaning your shoes: Crep shoe cleaning solution (100 ml), microfibre cleaning cloth and premium hog hair brush. It also comes with a tight carrying case, so you can easily store it or bring it along on trips. The only thing you need is the water.  Although I've only tries it on my leather and nylon kicks, I'm sure it would also do well for suede, nubuck and other materials.  I would definitely buy more of these babies in the future.

The media could not be loaded.

reviews.title: Nice carrying case, decent cleanser, brush grew mold with less than 10 uses.
reviews.body: Bought this product to clean my sneakers (mainly got it for the brush and the carrying case as I use castille soap which works GREAT to clean shoes). Anyways, the cleanser works alright. It doesn't exactly perform miracles, even when multiple applications are applied.  However, the brush works really well, especially on mesh cloth. The reason why I gave it 3 stars is because my brush grew mold on it VERY quickly. I would let it dry after use but it still grew mold on it and I haven't even owned it for more than 2-3 months (and have used it LESS than 10 times).  Anyways, I ended up throwing out the case and the brush. Would highly recommend using castille soap and a soft bristle toothbrush. I may also give the Jason Markk brush a try because cleaning my shoes with a toothbrush takes a long time because of the small surface area.

date.raw: Reviewed in Germany on January 6, 2024

reviews.title: It sort of works but it’s not worth £5 let alone the £14 they’re charging
reviews.body: I restore and resell old trainers so I thought I’d give this a try.  Following the instructions I applied the cleaner to one shoe on each test pair to the difference it made and as you can see from the photos I’ve had mixed results. On the Jordan’s I tried you can see that it has worked to a certain extent but there is no marked difference on the Adidas.  Looking at the results I can’t see much if any benefit to using this product over just using a damp cloth. The foam turning from purple to white seems ‘gimmicky’ at best and even though they might work better on less soiled shoes, for £14 I wouldn’t recommend this product.  AVOID!
reviews.body_html:
I restore and resell old trainers so I thought I’d give this a try.

Following the instructions I applied the cleaner to one shoe on each test pair to the difference it made and as you can see from the photos I’ve had mixed results. On the Jordan’s I tried you can see that it has worked to a certain extent but there is no marked difference on the Adidas.

reviews.title: This stuff really works !
reviews.body: Wow ! This stuff works great !!! It has completely cleaned five pairs of my older running shows and made them look like they were only a few months old. These won't make your year old shoes look brand new but they will take out all the dirt, get rid of the yellow color that it turns white sneakers after a while and restores the dingy colors back to as vibrant as they used to be.  The thing I noticed is the more you take your time, have a warm bowl of water next to wherever you are washing and make sure the soap is lathering up , the better it will clean. If the soap starts to fade and doesn't later, add it to the brush, not the water, scrub across horizontally and vertically a few times, it seems to get the dirt out better.

product.title: Crep Protect Ultimate Scuff Eraser - Sneaker Cleaner for Suede and Nubuck Shoes

reviews.title: Wish I would have taken a before photo!!
reviews.body: I slipped on ice and got my gray/beige suede Adidas NMD C2’s dirty. I didn’t know how to clean them, really. I recently watched a YouTube video and saw this product in action & thought I’d give it a try. Why not? I am so happy I ordered this!! It worked very, very, very well!!! I’m stoked to have my shoes back!! Great price, great product!! P.S. I also grabbed a new nail scrub brush from the $1 store to brush the suede & restore the the flattened grain — worked awesome in combo!! No fancy suede shoe detailing brush needed! I ordered new laces, too. OMG, brand new looking shoes! The pictures do not do them justice!! Now I’m obsessed with shoe cleaning. 🧼🪥👟

reviews.title: Solid product
reviews.body: Used it on a pair of New Balance 990 and have to say I came away pretty happy. They don’t look brand new, but as you can see in the picture there is a marked improvement in removing the black scuff from the toe. Perfect for me since these are my every day shoes, they don’t have to be perfect but it will help me maintain them and keep them looking nice. Figure it will help on my daughter’s Uggs when she inevitably scuffs them up.  Be careful around applied graphics though. One swipe and I could see the vinyl 990 sticker start to come off so I worked around. Makes sense, not a big deal. Just be careful.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023

reviews.title: Handy on the go sneaker eraser
reviews.body: Great for on the go when you don't have access to full sneaker cleaner kit. Works very well and took of lots of markings and dirt off my white shoes. Very shocked by how good the results were. Only issue if an issue at all was the eraser itself was very small in size. I was expecting bigger based on photos. Its about the size of a small bar of soap. Eraser did wear down pretty good after first use on 1 pair of sneakers so I can only imagine it to last for about 10-15 sneaker cleanings at best. For the price I cant complaint. It did what its meant to do in convenient fashion. I definitely recommend this for any sneakerhead who would like to have something to clean and wipe shoes on the go. Nothing worse than getting that mark or scuff when your away from home and its a total eye sore which cant wait to be dealt with . I personally would prefer this over sneaker wipes or on the go cleaners. More compact, convenient, and easier to use and carry for all ages. Definitely give 5 stars and my future recommendations.

reviews.title: Awesome eraser!
reviews.body: To be expected from the Crep family of products, this eraser is truly fantastic for removal of scuffs, grime, (most) stains, and etc from suede, rubber, leather, Crocs (TM), and etc! It leaves a slight bit of dust as you “erase” the way to clean tread, but given that it is named “eraser” it would be expected like any other eraser to have a little reminder of the grime that’s being swept away… over the garbage can, outside, over a piece of newspaper, and the like would easily keep the dust at bay. Great product! Has lasted a long time! Will buy another!

reviews.title: Effektiver Reiniger
reviews.body: Die Anwendung des Radiergummis ist denkbar einfach. Durch sanftes Reiben über die betroffenen Stellen lassen sich Verschmutzungen mühelos entfernen. Dabei überzeugt der Reiniger durch seine schonende Wirkung auf das Material, ohne dabei die Farben oder die Struktur des Wildleders zu beeinträchtigen.  Ein großer Pluspunkt ist die Effizienz des Crep Protect Radiergummis. Er eignet sich nicht nur für die Beseitigung von neuen Flecken, sondern auch für das Auffrischen und Entfernen von älteren Flecken, wodurch die Sneaker wieder wie neu aussehen.  Die handliche Größe des Radiergummis macht ihn zu einem praktischen Begleiter für unterwegs, sodass man seine Sneaker jederzeit und überall pflegen kann. Dies wird unterstützt durch das stabile Metall Case. Die Langlebigkeit des Produkts ist ebenfalls lobenswert, da der Radiergummi eine beträchtliche Anzahl von Anwendungen ermöglicht.  Ein Punkt Abzug erfolgt aufgrund des vergleichsweise höheren Preises im Vergleich zu anderen Reinigungsprodukten auf dem Markt. Dennoch ist die Qualität des Crep Protect Radiergummis in Anbetracht seiner Wirksamkeit und Schonung der Schuhmaterialien durchaus gerechtfertigt.  Alles in allem ist der Radiergummi eine empfehlenswerte Investition für Sneakerliebhaber, die ihre Schuhe in Top-Zustand halten möchten oder sie immer mit Wasser zu putzen.
reviews.body_html:
Die Anwendung des Radiergummis ist denkbar einfach. Durch sanftes Reiben über die betroffenen Stellen lassen sich Verschmutzungen mühelos entfernen. Dabei überzeugt der Reiniger durch seine schonende Wirkung auf das Material, ohne dabei die Farben oder die Struktur des Wildleders zu beeinträchtigen.

Ein großer Pluspunkt ist die Effizienz des Crep Protect Radiergummis. Er eignet sich nicht nur für die Beseitigung von neuen Flecken, sondern auch für das Auffrischen und Entfernen von älteren Flecken, wodurch die Sneaker wieder wie neu aussehen.

Die handliche Größe des Radiergummis macht ihn zu einem praktischen Begleiter für unterwegs, sodass man seine Sneaker jederzeit und überall pflegen kann. Dies wird unterstützt durch das stabile Metall Case. Die Langlebigkeit des Produkts ist ebenfalls lobenswert, da der Radiergummi eine beträchtliche Anzahl von Anwendungen ermöglicht.

Ein Punkt Abzug erfolgt aufgrund des vergleichsweise höheren Preises im Vergleich zu anderen Reinigungsprodukten auf dem Markt. Dennoch ist die Qualität des Crep Protect Radiergummis in Anbetracht seiner Wirksamkeit und Schonung der Schuhmaterialien durchaus gerechtfertigt.

Alles in allem ist der Radiergummi eine empfehlenswerte Investition für Sneakerliebhaber, die ihre Schuhe in Top-Zustand halten möchten oder sie immer mit Wasser zu putzen.

reviews.title: Nasty baby powder smell but also ineffective.
reviews.body: So there are a lot of product on the market to remedy smelly shoes. These were sort of sneaker balls meets silica desiccant pack. It did little to remove moisture or odor from my running shoes. The scent delivery only masks odor and not too well. It also lost its baby powder fragrance in a few weeks. reviews.title: realmente efficace per 'neutralizzare' gli odori sgradevoli, ma non è un profumatore per scarpe!
reviews.body: Mi è stato consigliato questo prodotto da amici e ne sono rimasto entusiasta! Il prodotto non va inteso come un 'profumatore' per scarpe ma essenzialmente 'assorbe' gli odori.. quindi se avete delle scarpe che tendono a rilasciare odori sgradevoli dopo l'utilizzo (vuoi per materiali scadenti, vuoi per altri problemi etc..) l'applicazione di queste due 'pillolone' all'interno delle scarpe permetterà l'assorbimento di tutti gli odori in poche ore lasciando le scarpe in una condizione inodore. Al successivo utilizzo delle scarpe ai piedi il cattivo odore potrà ripresentarsi... e potrà essere nuovamente assorbito utilizzando questo prodotto.. Quindi sintetizzando questo è un prodotto che 'neutralizza' gli odori, ma non un profumatore.

Quindi sintetizzando questo è un prodotto che 'neutralizza' gli odori, ma non un profumatore.

reviews.title: Ist okay
reviews.body: Da ich so begeistert von den restlichen Crep Produkten war, entschied ich mich auch dieses Produkt mal auszuprobieren.  Es sind zwei kleine Pillen, die mit einem Blumig-Zitronenartigen Geruch ausgestattet sind, wenn man diese aufdreht. Ich finde, dass der Geruch eher nach Klo Lufterfrischer riecht.  Ich hatte die Pillen 2 Tage in meinen Sportschuhen gelassen und das Ergebnis war nicht schlecht und auch nicht überragend.  Hm... der Preis könnte etwas niedriger sein.
reviews.body_html:

Hm... der Preis könnte etwas niedriger sein.

reviews.title: The Shoe Cleaning System for You
reviews.body: I’ve tried many other shoe cleaning system’s on the market and I have yet to find a system like Crep Protect. Whether you’re trying to protect your new shoes from rain, stains, and odors, or restoring dirty, beat up sneakers, this is the system for you. This box has everything you need to keep your shoes fresh and clean. I would also suggest buying the Crep Protect Rain and Stain Resistant Spray for brand new shoes and freshly cleaned shoes, as it creates a clear coat barrier around your sneakers to keep them water and stain free.
reviews.body_html: I’ve tried many other shoe cleaning system’s on the market and I have yet to find a system like Crep Protect. Whether you’re trying to protect your new shoes from rain, stains, and odors, or restoring dirty, beat up sneakers, this is the system for you. This box has everything you need to keep your shoes fresh and clean. I would also suggest buying the Crep Protect Rain and Stain Resistant Spray for brand new shoes and freshly cleaned shoes, as it creates a clear coat barrier around your sneakers to keep them water and stain free.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024

reviews.title: Fajny zestaw, zapakowany w gigantyczne pudełko.
reviews.body: Zestaw składa się z szczotki, odświeżaczy (2 sztuki), gumki do czyszczenia, jednorazowych mokrych ściereczek (6 sztuk), płynu do mycia (100 ml) oraz mikrofibry. Zaczynając od szczotki, jest ona naprawdę bardzo dobrej jakości, miałem dotychczas szczotkę od bezpośredniego konkurenta i ta zdecydowanie jest lepsza. Twardość określiłbym na średnią. Odświeżacze mają przyjemny zapach, otwiera się je poprzez przekręcenia, myślę, że coś tam dają faktycznie, jednak na pewno nie są tak skuteczne jak odświeżacz w sprayu. Gumka jak to gumka, wykonana dobrze spełnia swoje zadanie. Mokre ściereczki też, są dość duże, w zestawie mogłoby być ich więcej. Płyn spisuje się bardzo dobrze, fakt załączona do zestawu buteleczka 100 ml, jest naprawdę mała. Mikrofibra jest średniej jakości i jak dla mnie jest najsłabszym punktem, pozostałem przy mojej starej. Niestety musze przyznać, że to jak zapakowany jest ten produkt jest straszne. W dużym bardzo grubym pudle znajdują się 4 kolejne grube pudełka w których znajdują się plastikowe wypełniacze. Ilość śmieci jakie wylądowały w koszu po rozpakowanie takiego zestawu jest przerażająca. Ja osobiście zmieściłem wszystkie produktu, do tego jednego malutkiego pudełka...
reviews.body_html:
Zestaw składa się z szczotki, odświeżaczy (2 sztuki), gumki do czyszczenia, jednorazowych mokrych ściereczek (6 sztuk), płynu do mycia (100 ml) oraz mikrofibry. Zaczynając od szczotki, jest ona naprawdę bardzo dobrej jakości, miałem dotychczas szczotkę od bezpośredniego konkurenta i ta zdecydowanie jest lepsza. Twardość określiłbym na średnią. Odświeżacze mają przyjemny zapach, otwiera się je poprzez przekręcenia, myślę, że coś tam dają faktycznie, jednak na pewno nie są tak skuteczne jak odświeżacz w sprayu. Gumka jak to gumka, wykonana dobrze spełnia swoje zadanie. Mokre ściereczki też, są dość duże, w zestawie mogłoby być ich więcej. Płyn spisuje się bardzo dobrze, fakt załączona do zestawu buteleczka 100 ml, jest naprawdę mała. Mikrofibra jest średniej jakości i jak dla mnie jest najsłabszym punktem, pozostałem przy mojej starej.
Niestety musze przyznać, że to jak zapakowany jest ten produkt jest straszne. W dużym bardzo grubym pudle znajdują się 4 kolejne grube pudełka w których znajdują się plastikowe wypełniacze. Ilość śmieci jakie wylądowały w koszu po rozpakowanie takiego zestawu jest przerażająca. Ja osobiście zmieściłem wszystkie produktu, do tego jednego malutkiego pudełka...

reviews.title: The best shoe care kit
reviews.body: I recently purchased the Crep Protect Tube Pack and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed! This shoe care kit is perfect for anyone who wants to keep their shoes in pristine condition.  I used the repellent spray on my all-fabric AirMax 270s and I was amazed at how quickly and effectively it worked. My shoes were well-protected from water and dirt, and the spray didn't leave any residue or stains on my shoes. It was a relief knowing that my shoes were protected even when I had to wear them in the rain.  The cleaner in this kit is also fantastic. I had a pair of dirty white AirMax 97s that were long overdue for a cleaning. The cleaner worked like magic and my shoes looked brand new again! It was gentle on my shoes and didn't leave any harsh smells.  In summary, the Crep Protect Tube Pack is a versatile shoe care kit that delivers outstanding results. The repellent spray works wonders in protecting shoes from water and dirt, while the cleaner does an excellent job of cleaning and refreshing even the dirtiest shoes. If you want to keep your shoes looking great, then this kit is definitely worth the investment. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Here’s a very important update Read before purchasing.
reviews.body: So I just received my package today and cleaned my shoe then let it dry. I shook the Crep midsole marker for a few seconds and applied it. It took 5 to 10 pumps to get it going. Once it does lil long to stop. So I’d advise to spread what you have evenly as you can. Something I didn’t do properly learn from my mistakes as shown in pictures. I did 2 coats and let sit for 15 min before adding the second one as you can see I put too much on and didn’t do it even. I will update with pictures in a couple days so you can see the final results. I will say the Crepe pen is easy to move around with. It’s been 20 years since I’ve had to do this to my shoes. Back then it was a squeezable plastic bottle with a small sponge tip to white your shoes. I liked the Crepe pen because better to hold it in your fingers and easy to apply to your shoes. And for now I’m giving it 5 stars will update once it fully dries after a couple of days.  Update  It’s been 6 months since I put it on my shoes I thought everything went well but I noticed when I went to wipe dirt with my fingers that the product came off and was on my fingers. My shoes were not wet and I didn’t put a lot of pressure to wipe off a lil spot of dirt, my thoughts are if your were pants or anything and you rub on to anything it’s gonna come off and whatever you smudge it with will have a white stain from it. This was my 1st time wearing them outside just chilling with some friends not being active. Just beware what may happen.

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY SERIOUSLY DONT IT WILL CAUSE U A HEADACHE
reviews.body: DO NOT BUY!!!! READ THIS BEFORE HAND......I really hate to be that guy that gives Amazon a 1 star review because they honestly helped me out really smoothly and I would give them a 5 star as far as customer service they helped with getting a refund but people must know about this before buying. Honestly if I could I would give CREP a zero star rating as a company for even making a crap product like this. I followed every instruction very carefully and made sure that I was working with a clean surface. I let them dry for a intire day before I wore them even though I only need to wait 30 mins MAX. But as soon as I wore them with just about 100 steps of wearing them I noticed the paint was already chipping as you can see in the picture. reviews.body: Produit basiquement inutil, fait énormément de pâtés, laisse des grumeaux. Essayé en faisant plusieurs couches très fines, en faisant 2 couches comme proposé. Impossible de se débarrasser des traces, même en attendant 24h après une 1ere application le feutre arrache la peinture précédente en le passant, il fait énormément de grumeaux, et la peinture brille en séchant. La surface a été nettoyée au préalable à l'acétone. J'ai fini par abandonner et utiliser ce que j'utilise pour le cuir. Ca ne tiendra probablement pas dans le temps mais au moins le rendu est uniforme et j'ai 0 grumeaux. Bref 15€ gaspillés.

reviews.title: What scuffs
reviews.body: I had my doubts on this pen but I gave it a go anyway cause I had a few scuffs on my Jordans which are predominantly white and wanted to try and paint the scuffs out.  Now these 'scuffs' were more than just a little bit of use, the coating on the shoe was peeling off and the fabric underneath was showing so I thought I'd give this a go.  When looking at them on myself you couldn't tell they were painted with this pen. Yes, if you were to examine closely you could see a shade difference (probably due to the colour fade of the shoe overtime) but ultimately, this totally does give you an extra lease of life to the shoe.  I wouldn't mind, I have about 10 pairs of different trainers, I just love the Jordans I have so am eking every last wear out of them haha and thanks to the pen they still look good!

product.title: Crep Protect Ultimate On-The-Go Sneaker Cleaning Wipes - Use on Leather, Nylon, Canvas and More - 32 pack

reviews.title: Game-Changer for Sneaker Care On-The-Go
reviews.body: As someone who values the appearance of their footwear, finding a solution that offers both convenience and effectiveness was a game-changer. These wipes have become my go-to for maintaining my sneaker collection, and here's why.  Firstly, the versatility of these wipes is impressive. They're designed to tackle various stains and dirt, ensuring my sneakers always look fresh. I've used them on different materials, from leather to suede, and the results are consistently satisfying. The dual-textured design is ingenious – one side for tough stains and the other for general cleaning. This thoughtful feature means I can address different levels of dirt with the same wipe.  The convenience factor is another major plus. The wipes are individually wrapped, which makes them perfect for on-the-go scenarios. I've stashed them in my car, backpack, and even my office drawer. Whether I'm traveling or just out for a day, having the ability to quickly clean up any unexpected scuffs or stains is invaluable.  Their effectiveness is not just a claim; it's a reality. I've been pleasantly surprised by how well these wipes remove dirt and stains without damaging the shoe material. They're gentle yet powerful, and I've seen them work wonders on some of my most stubborn marks.  Moreover, the Crep Protect brand has established itself as a leader in sneaker care, and these wipes are a testament to their innovation and understanding of what sneaker enthusiasts need. Their commitment to quality is evident in every wipe.  These wipes have become an essential part of my sneaker care routine. They're convenient, effective, and versatile – a trifecta that's hard to beat. For anyone who cherishes their sneaker collection, these wipes are a must-have. They keep your shoes looking spotless with minimal effort, ensuring you're always stepping out in style.

reviews.title: Average Shoe Wipes
reviews.body: Shoes wipes that are very sturdy (meaning they will not tear or shred even if used aggressively) and well soaked to use over 1 to 3 pairs of shoes. The small dimensions of the wipe are deceiving because I have averaged 3 shoes per wipe and never felt like I had to limit my use on any one pair in order to cover all 3 pairs; there is plenty of cleanser on the wipe to do a good cleaning of all 3 pairs. The overall results are good. I would say 3.5/4 out of 5. It won’t remove every stain or dirt spot, so don’t expect a perfect result.12 wipes come packed in a thin sturdy aluminum case. Recommend for any leather shoe. I would rebuy when I need more in the future.

reviews.title: Really Works
reviews.body: I purchased these wipes, to use along with the "Crep Protect: The Ultimate Rain & Stain Resistant Barrier" spray. I must admit that I was skeptical, at first. I used the spray on my Nike Air Max 270's, and they still look nearly brand new. I initially treated them with the spray, and then wiped them from time to time (when necessary) with the wipes. I've worn my sneaks in red sand, mud, and dirt; and practically every day on vacation in Mexico (various cities) and Turkey. This product was suggested to me, by the rep who sold me my sneakers, in Finish Line. He said that he uses it on his sneakers, and prefers it over competitor brands. That originally sold me. I would definitely recommend this product, and will be purchasing again, when I run out. I've had my sneaks for a little over a year now, while maintaining with this product.

reviews.title: Pretty disappointing
reviews.body: I’m usually a “you get what u pay for” kinda guy. These though, are not worth the money. I had high hopes but they’re really ineffective. Baby wipes actually work better because they have more of a slight lathering effect. These are pretty much like only water is in them. They don’t remove marks or dirt that’s set in the shoe. Only dust. The rough side is no more effective than the smooth side on the mid soles. The packaging is nice and the portability is okay, but I’d rather just use a napkin and water if I’m out and about and need a quick wipe. I’ve tried to use them just to wipe down a pair before heading out the door, and they’re not even good for that. Would definitely not buy again.

product.title: Crep Protect The Ultimate Shoe Shaper Trees Black (2 Pairs)

reviews.title: Affordable Shoe Trees That Do the Job
reviews.body: I recently picked up these shoe tree pairs from Crep Protect based on their reputation for quality shoe care products and affordable pricing. I'm happy to say these basic shoe trees perform just as well as more expensive options when it comes to keeping nice shoes in good shape.  The trees slide easily into all my shoes and provide a snug fit to maintain the shape and minimize creasing while not being worn. The included illustrated instructions made setup simple and adjustment is easy when switching between different shoe sizes.  For the very reasonable price, these basic plastic shoe trees get the job done for keeping expensive footwear stored properly. If you're looking for an affordable shoe tree option from a trusted brand, I'd recommend giving Crep Protect a try. So far I've been very pleased with the quality and performance.
reviews.body_html:

reviews.title: Better than sole trees

One other thing I’ve noticed is that the foot mold part fills the shoe just right and is the perfect narrowness for track spikes as compared to the sole trees which are bit wider and can stretch out your shoes so maybe it matters what kind of shoe you’re using this product on. Either way I plan to buy more. And will update with a photo later

Im still on the lookout for something exactly the same concept of these shoe shapers, but better quality. Great idea, and would be a great product if they used better materials and constructed them better.

reviews.title: A GREAT STURDY CASE TO KEEP MY JORDANS AND LEBRONS SNEAKERS
reviews.body: Finally found a case that can hold and display my Nike Jordans and LeBrons. Assembly was easy but it did take a while to figure out which side goes to which side. Cause all the clear plastic pieces look alike. It did come with instructions which shows the parts to which side it goes on but in the drawings every pieces look alike. But once I figured it out. It took me 10 mins tops to assemble it. When assembling the case you have to squeeze the clear parts in the dark parts. And it snaps into place. Just be careful you don't crack the plastic snapping it in. Other than that it is a great case that can hold most shoes or some low top boots in it. Very sturdy once assembled. It is hard plastic that can break if your not careful. Like plastic that you will find in car models kits but thicker and in gloss. Otherwise great case to keep your shoes instead of the shoe box. Also it is stackable. So I will be buying some more to put my other shoes in. Giving this 5 stars for being a great display case and keeping your shoes clean and dust free.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024

reviews.title: Crate-ness
reviews.body: These Crep Protect Shoe crates are beautifully made. The clarity of the see-thru panels is perfect. The door is one of the best I’ve seen, It is still the weak part just like all the other shoe crates out there, but this one is made better at the hinge point. I do like the shiny black on the crates, but be cautious as it will scuff easily. I use a microfiber cloth and a low alcohol content window cleaner, as to reduce the chances of causing haziness on the clear coat. It’s the simple things to ensure things continue to look great. I will definitely be ordering 6 more of these boxes, as I like the way these look as a wall. I was able to fit a men’s Hi/Mid/Low sizes 9.5-10.5 Into these crates with no issues. I really want a crate where I can store my sneakers with the sneaker box, these you may be able to do that with a smaller size. Measure your shoe boxes, then check the interior measurements on the Amazon ad.

reviews.title: These are some really nice shoe display boxes
reviews.body: I have amassed a few too many sneakers and wanted to display some of the nicer pairs that I don't always wear and a display shoes box with easy access like this set with magnetic closures seemed like a good idea. It took a little bit of time getting the boxes put together as they come flat packed but it isn't too hard having it setup at the end. The fit and finish of the boxes are pretty nice and the magnetic door enclosures are smooth and really easy to open and close. If there was one thing that I had a niggle against the shoe boxes it would be that it does get quite expensive if you need a lot of these display boxes but they are pretty nice boxes overall and worth it if you want a nice box to display your sneakers.

reviews.title: Good Quality but Pricey
reviews.body: I received this item free from Vine.  This display case is versatile, suitable for showcasing not just shoes but also miniatures and models. However, for sneaker enthusiasts with larger shoe sizes (US11+), the fit is snug, making it challenging to position shoes attractively. The case is more accommodating for shoe sizes 10 or smaller.  Featuring front drop-down magnetic doors with soft-close technology, it provides easy access. Its stackable design with a unique interlocking system is a plus, allowing safe vertical stacking without tilting. The three-sided clear viewing and UV protection panels are thoughtful touches, protecting contents from sunlight discoloration and dust. Ideal for collectors and hobbyists seeking a neat display solution for smaller items.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

reviews.title: Limited stacking options
reviews.body: Like similar boxes, this seems like it should be easy to put together, but it wasn't a slam dunk. After they're all together, the next thing was to try and figure out the best way to stack. I need to caveat this review in that I'm not using them to store shoes, but rather am putting them on the top shelf of a coat closet so I can store my hats and gloves neatly. The issue here is that these boxes only snuggly stack so that the doors always open down. I needed the top box to have the door open up, so I simply turned the box upside down. However they aren't built to stack that way; wasn't a huge issue though.  In general, whatever you are going to be using these for, these are solid and get the job easily done. Of course they are only compatible with their own other boxes, so you will be hooked into buying more and more of these as your storage needs increase. I'd suggest buying as many as you'd think you'd need the first time just in case they go out of business in the future.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023

reviews.title: Fiddly to put together, perfect for your “shoes”
reviews.body: Okay, I will admit it. I don’t fully understand shoe storage. I own exactly one pair of shoes, and I cannot, Gentle Reader, fathom the need for owning so many shoes you need dedicated storage for them.  I mean, how many feet do you have, anyway? Are there really so many occasions that call for special shoes that one would assemble an entire collection of shoes, including dedicated storage boxes for all those shoes? I truly do not understand.  However, that said, these boxes are perfect for storing any manner of things that are not shoes. So for the purpose of this review, I will discuss storing “shoes,” which you may use as a stand-in for any reasonably small items that you may wish to store, be they shoes or non-shoe items. (The photo shows one of the boxes atop my CNC machine in my workshop, holding such “shoes” as are necessary for the operation of a CNC milling machine and laser engraver.)  These storage boxes are, once assembled, quite rugged and easy to use. The magnetic swing-open door is a nice touch. I say “once assembled” because, while they are made of ony a few parts, they only go together in one way, and the order of operations is quite finicky. Once assembled, they really don't want to come apart again—the panels snap together in a way that isn't designed to let them snap back apart.  In a sense, assembling the boxes is like putting together a nuclear bomb. You’d best read the instructions before you begin, because you’ve only got one shot at getting it together right, and assembling the bits in the wrong order leads to unpredictable but generally sub-optimal results.  They’re nicely designed and nicely packaged; if someone were to make these out of wood, they’d be praised the world over as the revival of the Shaker craftsman’s ethic. Yes, they’re cheap molded plastic, but they’re well-designed cheap molded plastic.  They lock together for stacking, in the event you should want to stack your shoes...or your “shoes.” Excessively fussy assembly aside, they’re actually quite nice, if a bit spendy.

reviews.title: These are a game changer!
reviews.body: As an avid sneaker collector, I've always struggled to find a storage solution that effectively protects and showcases my prized possessions. The Crep Protect Crates Shoe Storage Box has been an absolute game-changer, providing the perfect combination of style, functionality, and protection for my sneaker collection.  The sleek and durable design of the crates not only enhances the aesthetic of my storage space but also ensures that my sneakers remain pristine and dust-free. The UV protection panels safeguard against discoloration caused by sunlight, while the crystal-clear viewing window allows me to admire my collection without having to open each crate.  The stackable design is incredibly space-efficient, allowing me to maximize my storage capacity and keep my collection organized. reviews.title: Top-notch sneaker storage
reviews.body: You get what you pay for when it comes to sneaker and shoe storage boxes, and these are definitely up there when it comes to sturdiness, so expect to pay a premium. As long as you know that, you'll be very happy with these boxes.  These aren't your 12 for $25 collapsible boxes that will sag and fall apart after a while. These are a thick plastic, snap-together design. The door stays shut with two magnets on either side. They are tall enough for Jordan 1s with room to spare (those pictured are size US men's 9.5).  Also, for those that don't know, this is the same company known for the shoe protection spray that's been around for years.  Would it cost a lot to have enough for a whole sneaker collection? For sure. Would it look great though once all built up? For suuuuure!

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023

reviews.title: There are cheaper alternatives 1/4 the price that do the EXACT same thing
reviews.body: First in market, 4x the price:  Crep came into the market with celebrities promoting this, yet when it's inside your shoe, WHO CARES ABOUT THE NAME BRAND?  Furthermore, for every review you read that says that it sticks to your socks, the reason is because they have an additional USELESS rubber silicone layer that makes your crease guard and shoes smellier, your feet hotter, adds 4x the price, and sticks to your socks for no reason.  Tearing the rubber silicone layer feels so much better and makes your socks frictionless on the top of your shoe (a good thing).  THEN ON A HUNCH, I went and bought 4 pairs of the "YOLOPARK Shoe Creases Protector" for $9.99 on Amazon on a hunch because they didn't have the silicone layer. THEY WORK AND FEEL THE SAME, IF NOT BETTER!  Do the simple math: 1 pair smelly@$$ Creps = $12, or 4 pairs YOLOPARK Shoe Creases Protectors = $9.99
reviews.body_html:
First in market, 4x the price:

Crep came into the market with celebrities promoting this, yet when it's inside your shoe, WHO CARES ABOUT THE NAME BRAND?

Furthermore, for every review you read that says that it sticks to your socks, the reason is because they have an additional USELESS rubber silicone layer that makes your crease guard and shoes smellier, your feet hotter, adds 4x the price, and sticks to your socks for no reason.

Tearing the rubber silicone layer feels so much better and makes your socks frictionless on the top of your shoe (a good thing).

THEN ON A HUNCH, I went and bought 4 pairs of the "YOLOPARK Shoe Creases Protector" for $9.99 on Amazon on a hunch because they didn't have the silicone layer. THEY WORK AND FEEL THE SAME, IF NOT BETTER!

Do the simple math:
1 pair smelly@$$ Creps = $12, or
4 pairs YOLOPARK Shoe Creases Protectors = $9.99

product.title: Crep Protect Shoe Protector Spray - Rain & Stain Waterproof Nano Protection for Sneaker, Leather, Nubuck, Suede & Canvas

reviews.title: A Sneakerhead's Ultimate Shield
reviews.body: If you're passionate about keeping your sneakers in pristine condition, Crep Protect Spray is a must-have in your arsenal. As someone who cherishes a crisp pair of kicks, I was amazed by the effectiveness of this product. The experience begins with the ease of application - a quick, even spray coats the shoe, forming an invisible barrier that repels liquids and prevents stains. It’s like an invisible force field for your footwear!  The real magic happens when you test its capabilities. Accidentally spilling coffee on my sneakers used to be a nightmare, but with Crep Protect, the liquid just beads up and rolls off. It's almost mesmerizing to watch! The spray doesn't alter the look or feel of the shoes, which is a huge plus. You can't tell it's there, but it's working tirelessly to safeguard your beloved sneakers.  Durability is another standout aspect. I've walked through muddy fields and rainy streets, yet my shoes remained unscathed. A single application lasts a couple of weeks, even with daily wear. It’s reassuring to know that my sneakers are protected against the elements and the unexpected.  What really sets Crep Protect apart is its versatility. It works wonders on various materials - suede, nubuck, or canvas - without any damage or discoloration. This adaptability makes it a staple for anyone with a diverse sneaker collection.  In conclusion, Crep Protect Spray is a game-changer. It’s an easy-to-use, effective solution that keeps sneakers looking fresh and new. For anyone serious about their shoe game, it's an investment that pays off with every step. Protect your passion, one spray at a time!

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024

reviews.title: Water resistance good
reviews.body: Great for my UGG Tasman shoes, this spray is great for being water resistant/proof. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is due to the smell lingering. After spraying one pair of shoes and leaving them in the sun for the 20 minutes instructed and then wearing and getting in my car the odor was so strong I had to roll the windows down. After wearing a couple of times the smell finally went away. It’s a very strong chemical smell, I would still recommend this spray though bc of how well it works! If the smell stayed longer I wouldn’t recommend but since it subsides after a while I think it’s worth the buy! Works excellent for UGG brand shoes and that type of material for other shoes! This one can would probably do 3 pairs of shoe’s depending on size and type of shoes.

reviews.title: effective on leather and running shoes
reviews.body: So far so good. I sprayed a pair of running shoes and leather loafers with 3 coats waiting for them to dry between each coat. I haven't worn either pair in a heavy downpour so I can't attest to that, however water was repelled in a light rain. I was concerned the leather would change the color but it did darken the shoes a little which is why I took off one star. The product came out in a fine even mist and there's plenty more in the can for touch ups down the road if needed. Use plenty of ventilation when spraying.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024

reviews.title: Seems to work but you need a lot
reviews.body: I got 1 can of this, thinking I could waterproof my Tasmans, Disquettes, Classic Mini IIs, and Bailey Buttons. That is NOT the case. I tried it on the Tasmans first and did 2 layers like it said. I tested it out with some water and realized I either missed some spots or it wasn’t coated thick enough in those areas so I did a 3rd coat. Then I went in with the first coat on the Disquettes and Minis and let them dry. Went back in for a 2nd coat on those and did the Disquettes and then got maybe halfway done with one Mini boot and the can was empty. I’d say get 1 can per pair of shoes to make sure you have enough to get them really well coated. I just ordered 2 more cans to 3rd coat the Disquettes, finish the Minis and hopefully do the Bailey Button ones but I’m thinking I’ll probably need another. And then I may have to get another can for my Timbs. Also you should do this in a garage or covered porch because I did it in the shower with the fan running and window open and I literally cannot set foot in there now, the smell is so strong and the air is so thick. However like I said, it seems to work so I’d say it’s worth it, just keep these things in mind.

reviews.title: Perfect for uggs
reviews.body: I bought this product to waterproof my brand new mustard seed tazz platform uggs after seeing it on TikTok and it did not disappoint! I tried this spray on my older uggs first to test out if the color changed after using the spray. The color does get darker when the spray is wet but don’t freak out because the color will go back to normal once it is dry! I used it on my light colored (mustard seed) Uggs and this photo is after the spray had dried, no discoloration whatsoever! The only complaint I have about the product is that it ran out super quick. By the time I did 2 coats on my older Uggs, I was only able to get one coat on my new platform Uggs so I would definitely buy 2 cans or more depending on how many pairs you need to spray. I did test the spray out by wearing my older Uggs out in the pouring rain and they didn’t get wet at all!!

reviews.title: Crep Protect Spray: Guardian Angel for Your Sneakers
reviews.body: I recently discovered the Crep Protect Shoe Protector Spray, and it's nothing short of amazing. As a sneaker enthusiast, keeping my kicks pristine is a top priority, and this spray has become an essential part of my shoe care routine.  The 4.39oz (124g) can may seem compact, but its power is undeniable. Rain and stains stand no chance against the nano-level protection this spray offers. Whether it's leather, nubuck, suede, or canvas, my sneakers have found their guardian angel.  The application is a breeze, and the quick-drying formula means no waiting around for my shoes to be ready for action. What I love most is that it doesn't compromise the look or feel of my sneakers. They remain breathable, comfortable, and, most importantly, shielded from the elements.  The versatility of this spray is another standout feature. It's not just for rain; it's a formidable defense against spills, dirt, and whatever else the urban jungle throws your way. The peace of mind knowing that my sneakers are protected adds an extra layer of enjoyment to every step I take.  The set includes two thumbs up for the removable stainless steel and glass bowls, making it a perfect fit for my small furry friends. This 5/5 rating isn't just about satisfaction; it's about finding a reliable companion for my sneakers' longevity and style.

The only reason im giving 3 and not 4/5 stars is because the front door on one of the crates had a big scratch when I opened it which for the price you pay is unexcusable.

reviews.attributes_flat: Size: onesize M US, Color: Black

reviews.title: Some assembly required, expensive but worth it!
reviews.body: First off, there is no way around how expensive these containers are when you compare it to the much cheaper ones found on Amazon or Container Store. Also, reading the mixed reviews on Aamzon doesn't help much and watching the few reviews I found on YouTube still didn't sell me. In the end, I decided to take a chance and if I didn't like them I would just return them.  Second, some assembly is required and the instructions are just illustrations but its easy enough to figure out so don't trip. Once you have all the pieces put together you'll need a bit of muscle to ensure all pieces are clicked together. Just don't give it too much muscle or you'll break them. They are definitely sturdier than the cheaper ones and considering they come in pieces. Make sure you inspect every single piece for cracks before you put it together, otherwise you'll have a hard time taking them apart.  Finally, I love these sneaker boxes (I've had them for a year now). They are black, have a magnetic door, stakable like legos, and my size 13 shoes fit perfectly. I will be swapping out my other shoe containers for more of these bad boys. If you are a shoe collector or just have a bunch of shoes like me and you want to have the best container your shoes deserve then look no further. I highly recommend.
reviews.body_html:
First off, there is no way around how expensive these containers are when you compare it to the much cheaper ones found on Amazon or Container Store. Also, reading the mixed reviews on Aamzon doesn't help much and watching the few reviews I found on YouTube still didn't sell me. In the end, I decided to take a chance and if I didn't like them I would just return them.

Second, some assembly is required and the instructions are just illustrations but its easy enough to figure out so don't trip. Once you have all the pieces put together you'll need a bit of muscle to ensure all pieces are clicked together. Just don't give it too much muscle or you'll break them. They are definitely sturdier than the cheaper ones and considering they come in pieces. Make sure you inspect every single piece for cracks before you put it together, otherwise you'll have a hard time taking them apart.

Finally, I love these sneaker boxes (I've had them for a year now). They are black, have a magnetic door, stakable like legos, and my size 13 shoes fit perfectly. I will be swapping out my other shoe containers for more of these bad boys. If you are a shoe collector or just have a bunch of shoes like me and you want to have the best container your shoes deserve then look no further. I highly recommend.

reviews.title: Because They’re Worth It.
reviews.body: This is a very good product, the packaging is also premium, the panels are well protected in the box/packaging. I found the first crate challenging to assemble then after that it was easy, my trainers have a nice new home and the crates look smart; I spent a lot of time making comparisons and these worked out to be the best because of their quality, yes they are expensive but I would say that they’re definitely worth the investment. One word of warning though: Make sure that the pieces are kept separate per set/crate because after assembling eight boxes I made the error of not having the pieces separate for my next Crept Box purchase and incorrectly put a crate together with two of the wrong large panels and clicked them in and now I cannot separate them so please be careful as it looks like I won’t have the use of two boxes, also I have noticed that there is some scuff marks on the panels and see through lids but I won’t hold it against them!
reviews.body_html: This is a very good product, the packaging is also premium, the panels are well protected in the box/packaging. I found the first crate challenging to assemble then after that it was easy, my trainers have a nice new home and the crates look smart; I spent a lot of time making comparisons and these worked out to be the best because of their quality, yes they are expensive but I would say that they’re definitely worth the investment. reviews.title: Great product, but arrived damaged!
reviews.body: Really good product and keeps shoes free from scrapes/accidental damage they may get from a drawer or being on the floor.  I’m a size 10.5 UK and these fit perfectly with a bit more room at the back, so size 11 should be no problem.  Despite being heavily protected by the box and protective material, the plastic door panels arrived with scrapes and the black plastic panels had scratches, marks and damage on them. As seen in my attached photos.  In conclusion, this product is amazing if you’re looking to protect valuable shoes/trainers(sneakers) but unfortunately due to the fact they arrived damaged with scrapes etc at their price point; I’ve given three stars which I believe to be fair.
reviews.body_html:
Really good product and keeps shoes free from scrapes/accidental damage they may get from a drawer or being on the floor.

I’m a size 10.5 UK and these fit perfectly with a bit more room at the back, so size 11 should be no problem.

Despite being heavily protected by the box and protective material, the plastic door panels arrived with scrapes and the black plastic panels had scratches, marks and damage on them. As seen in my attached photos.

In conclusion, this product is amazing if you’re looking to protect valuable shoes/trainers(sneakers) but unfortunately due to the fact they arrived damaged with scrapes etc at their price point; I’ve given three stars which I believe to be fair.

reviews.title: Looks good but expensive and made of brittle plastic and takes up a lot of room
reviews.body: This product looked really good but has been a complete failure for me personally. Expensive purchase at £35 for pack of 2. Within minutes of assembly, I had dropped one about 1 metre onto wooden floor, and the brittle plastic broke. It also made a big hole in my parquet floor! So one down, only one left! Then I discovered that although they look good, they take up a lot more space in cupboards etc. than have shoes loose or in much smaller shoe boxes. So best suited for sneaker fans with big collections who have benefit of big walk-in dressing rooms. I managed to break the second box within a week - so the brittle plastic ended up in my recycling bin. Huge waste of money for me. But they will work for some people.
